title: okimzti
author: okimzti
content: AUCTION TERMSItem for Sale: https://cryptomatic.io/collections/the-cryptomat-collection-bitcoin-watchesThese stunning watches were sold in 2014 for a very brief time.  There is only a few hundred sets ever made.  This auction is for a complete set of watches, with matching serial #31.This is the original watch collection from Cryptomatic, very hard to find these days, especially a complete set.These are all brand new, the black watch was resized (links included) for review & pictures (see images below).  All watches are in amazing condition.  The box glue the company used has failed over the years.  The boxes are in rough shape, but they have protected the watches perfectly.Bid Format:  BTCStarting Bid: 0.3 BTCMinimum Bid Increment: 0.01 BTCBuy It Now:  0.55 BTCAuction End Time: Saturday, 19 November 2022 22:00:00.000 GMTAuction End Time Epoch: 1668895200Sniping:  No sniping. 10 minute standard sniping rule.Shipping: Ships from USA. Free Shipping to USA.  Buyer pays shipping outside of USA.  Buyer responsible for any and all customs/dutiesPayment Due: Within 24 hoursEscrow: Available at cost of buyer (prefer OgNasty or minerjones)Verification Image: https://i.imgur.com/NzVAxXQ.jpegAll Images: https://imgur.com/a/1j8oTvF
